message: Let's split it evenly to start, Bob!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm hoping for a better deal later!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make up for the inflation!
I'm being generous, but I'm not getting any younger, and I need a bigger share!
I'm getting desperate, but I still need a decent share to make it worth my while!
I'm not getting any younger, and I'm taking what I can get - don't expect me to be generous!
I'm not getting any younger either, Bob! I need a better deal or I'll walk!
I'm not budging, take it or leave it - I'm getting desperate!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or walk away!
I'm not going to get a better deal, so I'm taking what I can - you're getting the short end of the stick!
I'll take whatever I can get at this point. It's better than nothing!
It's now or never, Alice. I'm taking the lion's share, and you're getting a tiny bit. That's the final offer!
